title: Great clean find, helpful and welcoming staff!
text:
I am so glad that I found this hotel...it was reasonably priced...it was extremely clean and orderly. The location was great - close to the action, but not in the heart of it. There are 4 subway entrances less than 100 feet away (if you're comfortable using the subway, which I personally wasn't, but I digress...). I will say that the immediate surroundings are not exactly "beautiful"...there are several buildings that appear to be completely empty or under construction, and there is a free clinic nearby, so there was usually a cast of characters around the weekday mornings, but no one ever bothered us. Everyone kept to themselves and we never felt unsafe - which is key. 3 buildings to the west there is a NYPD building - so there's also that. More importantly, halfway down the block towards 7th Ave, there are the most amazing bagels that I ever had in my life. I'm dreaming of them now as I type (Best Bagel and Coffee - go there! It will look busy, but it will move quickly!) Do it! The hotel is also just a few blocks from the Empire State Building and less than 1 block from Madison Square Garden (so a great location if you're in the area for a concert/event). The facilities in this hotel look amazing - we did not use them because we had such a full schedule - but they honestly were impressive. The bed was comfy (not quite a king, but bigger than a queen), the shower was lovely and the pressure was great. We used the coffee maker every morning. We loved the different lights you could switch too in the room too - it was fun to play around with the ambience. Oh - and most importantly - the windows were completely soundproof!!! You will sleep GREAT! :)
Overall, we were extremely satisfied with our stay and would absolutely stay here again on our next trip to NYC.
